BasicMessage - Interface in message
Interface any type of message the InputOutputHandler shall be capable of transmitting must implement.
BasicMessageProcessor - Class in messageProcessor
Takes messages from component InputOutputHandler, processes them (recoding, checking for replays, removing/adding padding, initiating message authentication) and bypasses them to component OutputStrategy.
BasicMessageProcessor() - Constructor for class messageProcessor.BasicMessageProcessor
 
BasicMessageProcessor.ReplyMixThread - Class in messageProcessor
Thread, which coordinates the mixing process of replies.
BasicMessageProcessor.RequestMixThread - Class in messageProcessor
Thread, which coordinates the mixing process of request.
